error: An unexpected error occurred: User 'facebook' not found or query returned no data.

facebook/zstd.summary: Recent activities in the facebook/zstd repository include a pull request to fix the ZSTD_readSkippableFrame function when handling a NULL destination, allowing it to correctly retrieve the frame size without asserting an error due to destination capacity.

facebook/react-native-website.summary: The facebook/react-native-website repository has seen activity with a pull request aimed at improving the documentation by fixing the indentation of the Codegen specification in the Fabric Native Components Introduction, enhancing the readability and maintainability of the site's content.
